public class MainActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity implements android.hardware.SensorEventListener
The MainActivity (Singleton) class is the entry point of the application. It manages user interaction and controls which fragments should be displayed.

      Setzt außer Kraft:
      onCreate in Klasse androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
      Parameter:

    • onResume

      protected void onResume()
      Called when the activity is started or resumed. Reconnects to MQTT if the sensor source is MPU6050. Registers senor listeners and restarts timers.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      onResume in Klasse androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

    • onPause

      protected void onPause()
      Called when the activity is paused or stopped. Disconnects from MQTT if the sensor source is MPU6050. Unregisters senor listeners and stops timers.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      onPause in Klasse androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

    • onBackPressed

      public void onBackPressed()
      Disables the backPress gesture.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      onBackPressed in Klasse androidx.activity.ComponentActivity

    • onPlayButtonClick

      public void onPlayButtonClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Play" button in the user interface. This method is called when the "Play" button is clicked and performs the necessary actions to start the game, such as validating the player's name, transitioning to the game screen and resetting the level.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "Play" button).

    • onHomeButtonClick

      public void onHomeButtonClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Home" button in the user interface. This method is called when the "Home" button is clicked and performs the necessary actions to navigate back to the start screen and resets the gameFinished variable to false.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "Home" button).

    • onSettingsClick

      public void onSettingsClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Settings" button in the user interface. This method is called when the "Settings" button is clicked and performs the necessary actions to navigate to the settings screen, save the current screen as the last screen, pause timers and update the current screen to the settings screen.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "Settings" button).

    • onSwitchSound

      public void onSwitchSound(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the sound switch toggle button in the user interface. This method is called when the sound switch button is toggled and performs the necessary actions to update the sound state and check if the music should play in the game screen.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the sound switch toggle button).

    • onBrokerSaveClick

      public void onBrokerSaveClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Save" button in the broker settings view. This method is called when the "Save" button is clicked and performs the necessary actions to save the broker address and connect to the new broker.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "Save" button).

    • onCloseClick

      public void onCloseClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Close" button in the settings view. This method is called when the "Close" button is clicked and performs the necessary actions to close the settings fragment and return to the previous screen. If the previous screen was GameScreenFragment, it unpauses timers.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "Close" button).

    • onBestenlisteClick

      public void onBestenlisteClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Leaderboard" button in the view. This method is called when the "Leaderboard" button is clicked and performs the necessary actions to navigate to the "Leaderboard" screen.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the ""Leaderboard"" button).

    • onMPUClick

      public void onMPUClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "MPU6050" radio button in the view. This method is called when the "MPU6050" radio button is clicked and switches the sensor source to MPU6050.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "MPU" radio button).

    • onSmartphoneSensorClick

      public void onSmartphoneSensorClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Smartphone Sensors" radio button in the view. This method is called when the "Smartphone Sensors" radio button is clicked and switches the sensor source to Smartphone Sensors.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "Smartphone Sensors" radio button).

    • onGameFinished

      public void onGameFinished()

    • onResignClick

      public void onResignClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Resign" button in the view. This method is called when the "Resign" button is clicked. It ends the game and stops the music if sound is turned on.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "Resign" button).

    • onRestartClick

      public void onRestartClick(android.view.View view)
      Handles the click event on the "Restart" button in the view. This method is called when the "Restart" button is clicked. It restarts the game and resets the level and timers.
      Parameter:
      view - The view that was clicked (the "Restart" button).

    • onSensorChanged

      public void onSensorChanged(android.hardware.SensorEvent sensorEvent)
      Called when there is a change in sensor values. This method is responsible for handling sensor changes and updating the player's movement based on the sensor readings. It only sends the data to PlayerController every SENSOR_UPDATE_INTERVAL.
      Angegeben von:
      onSensorChanged in Schnittstelle android.hardware.SensorEventListener
      Parameter:
      sensorEvent - The sensor event containing the updated sensor values.

    • getCpuTemperature

      private float getCpuTemperature()
      Retrieves the CPU temperature. This method reads the CPU temperature from the system and returns it in degrees Celsius.
      Gibt zurück:
      The CPU temperature in degrees Celsius, or 0.0 if it could not be retrieved.

    • startTemperatureTimer

      private void startTemperatureTimer()
      Starts a timer to periodically update the CPU temperature and play timer on the game screen. The timer updates every 1000ms.

    • onAccuracyChanged

      public void onAccuracyChanged(android.hardware.Sensor sensor, int accuracy)
      Called when the accuracy of a sensor has changed.
      Angegeben von:
      onAccuracyChanged in Schnittstelle android.hardware.SensorEventListener
      Parameter:
      sensor - The Sensor which has changed.
      accuracy - The new accuracy value of the sensor.

    • displayStatus

      public void displayStatus(android.widget.TextView textView, String data)
      Display the given data in the given TextView. This has to be done with runOnUiThread.
      Parameter:
      textView - The textView which should display the given data.
      data - The data which should be displayed in the given textView.

    • displayToast

      public void displayToast(String msg)
      Displays a toast message with the given String.
      Parameter:
      msg - The message which should be displayed in the toast message.

    • playConnectionSound

      public void playConnectionSound()
      Plays the connection sound if sound is enabled.

    • getSoundOn

      public boolean getSoundOn()
      Gets a boolean indicating weather sound is enabled or not.
      Gibt zurück:
      A flag indicating whether sound is enabled or not.

    • getBrokerAddress

      public String getBrokerAddress()
      Gets the broker address.
      Gibt zurück:
      A String holding the broker address.

    • getSensorSource

      public MainActivity.InputMethodEnum getSensorSource()
      Gets the current sensor source (MPU6050 or Smartphone Sensors).
      Gibt zurück:
      The current sensor source (MPU6050 or Smartphone Sensors).
